status: Part ClosureFromName or ID could not be matched. No such 'line' exists or is currently available. Please check the name or ID. The following lines are available: Bakerloo, Central, Circle, District, Hammersmith & City, Jubilee, Metropolitan, Northern, Piccadilly, Victoria, Waterloo & City, DLR, London Overground, Tfl Rail, Tram, Emirates Air Line, River Bus, Cable Car, Elizabeth line, and IFS Cloud Cable Car. Please try again with a valid line. Please refer to the documentation for more details. For example: https://api.tfl.gov.uk/Line/Mode/tube/Status. If the line ID or name contains special characters, please try URL encoding it. For example, 'Hammersmith & City' should be 'Hammersmith%20&%20City'. If you are trying to query by name, the name is case sensitive. Please ensure your name is in title case. For example: 'District'.
reason: Saturday 4 and Sunday 5 October, no service between Embankment / Edgware Road and Ealing Broadway / Kensington (Olympia) / Richmond / Wimbledon. In addition, between 0150 and 0630 Saturday, there will be no PICCADILLY LINE services between Hyde Park Corner and Acton Town. At other times, PICCADILLY LINE trains call additionally at Turnham Green. Use MILDMAY LINE services between Gunnersbury, Kew Gardens and Richmond when available.
